original_text: But God has showed everybody very clearly what he is like. He has showed you that he is kind. He causes the rain to fall from the sky. He causes the plants to give you food at the right time each year. He gives you plenty of food to eat. In these ways he makes you very happy.’
korean_text: 그러나 자기를 증언하지 아니하신 것이 아니니 곧 여러분에게 하늘로부터 비를 내리시며 결실기를 주시는 선한 일을 하사 음식과 기쁨으로 여러분의 마음에 만족하게 하셨느니라 하고

sentences.original_text: But God has showed everybody very clearly
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 모든 사람에게 매우 분명하게 보여주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He has showed you that he is kind
He causes the rain to fall from the sky
He causes the plants to give you food
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 식물들이 당신에게 음식을 주게 하십니다

sentences.original_text: at the right time each year
He gives you plenty of food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 당신에게 먹을 풍부한 음식을 주십니다

sentences.original_text: In these ways he makes you very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 이러한 방법으로 그분은 당신을 매우 기쁘게 하십니다
